meanings.definition: A drink made of flavored ice blended with fruit or soda.
meanings.sent1: I love to sip on a slushie on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: The slushie machine at the store always has a long line.
meanings.sent3: The colorful slushie looked like a rainbow in a cup.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled out like a fizzy slushie.
meanings.sent5: The slushie tasted like a burst of summer in my mouth.

meanings.definition: To make a slushie by blending ice with flavoring.
meanings.sent1: I will slushie some ice and syrup for a cool treat.
meanings.sent2: She loves to slushie different fruits for unique flavors.
meanings.sent3: He tried to slushie the ice so fast, it flew out of the blender!
meanings.sent4: The sound of the blender slushie-ing the ice filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled as they watched the ice slushie into a delicious drink.

meanings.definition: A semi-frozen mixture of snow and water.
meanings.sent1: The kids had fun playing with the slushie snow in the yard.
meanings.sent2: The slushie on the ground made walking slippery and cold.
meanings.sent3: The slushie snowball fight turned the yard into a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent4: The slushie puddles reflected the sunlight like tiny mirrors.
meanings.sent5: The slushie ice sparkled like diamonds in the winter sun.
